intro.text: In Germany, interest rate, initial repayment, equity and fixed-interest period are key. Our calculator gives you a better feeling for your potential monthly payment before you speak to banks or advisors.

Better position when negotiating with banks or independent financial advisors.

legal.title: Legal basics in Germany (short overview)
legal.text1: In Germany, residential consumer mortgages are regulated mainly by the German Civil Code (BGB) and the implementation of the EU Mortgage Credit Directive. Lenders must assess creditworthiness and provide comprehensive information and advice.
legal.text2: Typical cost components include interest, repayment, possible commitment interest, special repayment options and additional closing costs (real estate transfer tax, notary, land registry, etc.). These are not included in this calculator.
points: Residential consumer mortgages are subject to strict advisory and information requirements.
A loan may only be granted if repayment appears highly likely based on your financial situation.
Effective annual interest rate, total cost and fixed-interest period must be disclosed transparently.
Independent advice can help you compare offers from different banks.
legal.note: This section does not replace legal or financial advice. Binding information is only provided by your bank, financial institution or a licensed advisor.

disclaimer.short: Note: All calculations are non-binding examples and do not replace individual financial advice. Closing costs and your personal tax or life situation are not taken into account.
disclaimer.title: Important notice – no financial or legal advice
disclaimer.text1: All values shown here are for illustration only. They are based on simplified assumptions (constant interest rate, constant annuity, no special repayments, no consideration of fixed-interest periods) and do not constitute an offer or recommendation.
disclaimer.text2: Whether a mortgage is suitable for you depends on many individual factors such as income, assets, collateral, family situation, credit history and tax situation. Binding conditions and legal information will only be provided by your bank or a licensed financial service provider.
disclaimer.text3: MyHome24app does not provide its own legal, tax or investment advice. Please consult bank advisors, independent mortgage brokers or tax advisors for a personal assessment.
